page.title: 12"A Saturday"--Darras Hall
page.content: "I got up on Saturday at 7 o'clock.I played with my sister Gemma.We cut up magazines and made a house with the cut-outs. After about 2 hours Mum and Dad got up but Dad had to go to work because Barclays Bank open on Saturdays.For breakfast we had bacon, egg and beans. We went upstairs and I got dressed in a T-shirt and skirt. Then I went outside to ride my bike. After that I made a model with some cardboard boxes. Then I set the table for lunch,we had salad. We went to Grandmas and had some tea." { Anna,7 yrs } "For breakfast I had cereal,sausage, and toast. My lunch was lamb,potatoes, and peas. I used my computer for about an hour, then went in my bedroom to play with my train-set. { Andrew,7 yrs }
